One apple a day won't really keep the doctor away, but they are still good!
These tasty fruits will make you cheery!
Hard to open, but worth it.
Tart berries that grow in the springtime on Blossom Island.
Grows in the springtime on Blossom Island.
A staple grain, can be milled or ground into flour.
Sweet berries, can be eaten or cooked in nice desserts.
Tool used to cut trees, stumps and branches. This one has seen a few battles.
Tool used to till and dig soil. This one is very dull.
Tool used to break rocks and stones. This one barely works.
Tool used to cut long grass and harvest some crops. Not the sharpest, but does the job.
A tool used to water crops. This one is heavy and leaky.

Tool used to till and dig soil.
Tool used to break rocks and stones.
Tool used to cut long grass and harvest some crops.
A tool used to water crops.
Tool used to cut trees, stumps and branches. A pretty sturdy version.
Tool used to till and dig soil. This one is pretty strong.
Tool used to break rocks and stones. Stronger than the copper version.
Tool used to cut long grass and harvest some crops. Pretty sharp.
A tool used to water crops. Better than the copper version.
Tool used to cut trees, stumps and branches. Sharp and sturdy.
Tool used to till and dig soil. Sturdy and reliable.
Tool used to break rocks and stones. Pointy and sturdy.
Tool used to cut long grass and harvest some crops. Sharp and durable.
A tool used to water crops. Light and high-capacity.
Tool used to cut trees, stumps and branches. Can't get better than this one.
Tool used to till and dig soil. This one is very strong.
Tool used to break rocks and stones. Very pointy, top of the line.
Tool used to cut long grass and harvest some crops. The sharpest there is.
A tool used to water crops. This one is top of the line.
A roll of grass turf, can be placed on top of sand or grass.
A bag of sand, used to place down new sand.
A bag of dirt, used to place down new dirt. Also used in name-calling.
A bag of wheat seeds. They grow in spring, summer and fall and must be harvested with a sickle.
A bag of strawberry seeds. They grow in spring and can be harvested multiple times.
Hold and interact with a campfire to light it.
Coins. Make them jingle!
HalfCoins. Make them jingle... slightly less!
An empty bucket that can be filled with liquids.
An empty bottle that can be filled with liquids.
A bottle filled with refreshing water.
A few iron nails used in construction.
A legendary ore, to be smelted into bars.
A precious golden ore, to be smelted into bars.
A twinkling silver ore, to be smelted into bars.
A sturdy ore, to be smelted into bars.
A coppery ore, to be smelted into bars.
A black mineral with lots of uses. Good as a combustible.
A maleable mineral used for crafting.
A natural resin found in spruce trees. Can notably make torches.
Used for crafting and construction, a very useful stone.
A wooden log, used for crafting, as fuel or for construction.
A wooden plank, used in crafting or construction, or as fuel in a pinch.
A wooden stick used in crafting. Tie three together to make a sturdy rod.
A sturdy wooden rod used in crafting.
A sturdy rope to bind things together.
A palm frond, can be used in crafting or thrown in a fire for quick fuel. Makes good rope.
A bunch of leaves, can be used in crafting or thrown in a fire for quick fuel.
A basic wooden bed, sleeps okay for one person.
A nice fence made with wooden planks.
A classic fence made with wood logs.
A fire pit that will stay in place after burning out. Just add fuel and light with a fire starter.
A nice campfire which can be used to cook food. Disappears once burned-out. Light with a fire starter.
Grows yummy apples in fall when mature.
Grows sweet cherries in spring when mature
Wildflowers that grow naturally in the spring on Blossom Island.
Beautiful red roses, great as a gift or as decoration. Do well in all seasons.
Place this on your land and use it to fill up your Watering Can.
Use this to assemble all kinds of things.
Place it on your land and put anything you want to sell in there. It will be automatically sold the next day.
Place it on your land and store your items in there.
Use this to chop wood.
Place it on your land and train your Blossoms in Charm!
Place it on your land and train your Blossoms in Intellect!
Place it on your land and train your Blossoms in Strength!
Place it on your land and train your Blossoms in Agility!
A Blossom's own little home. Place it on your land and adopt a Blossom!
Simple resin torch to light your dark nights.
